Topic.Title: A note on Baker of Shireton and Fair by Hanon Ondricek

Posts.EditableText:
Both of these games need to write a small file to record achievements. If you play online, this should occur locally in your browser cache. If your browser blocks this, the game will likely crash with an error.

Easiest fix is to try a different browser, hopefully without those security specifications set. Otherwise, if you cannot run a browser that allows the file, download the gblorb from here (or IFDB) and run it with a Glulx interpreter (Lectrote is recommended as the easiest and is available on Mac, Windows, and Linux). 

Sorry for the hassle for anyone who ran into this.
